net.homeip.donaldm.httpdbase4j
Interface Templatable

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArchiveStringTemplateHandler, FileStringTemplateHandler, StringTemplateHandler, TemplatableAdapter
public interface Templatable

An interface that must be implemented by template populating class used by StringTemplateHandler.

Author:
Donald Munro
See Also:
StringTemplateHandler

Method Detail

templateFile

java.io.File templateFile(org.antlr.stringtemplate.StringTemplate template,
                          Request request,
                          java.lang.StringBuffer mimeType,
                          java.io.File dir)
Called by the StringTemplateHandler to populate a file based template.

Parameters:
template - The StringTemplate instance
request - The Request instance.
mimeType - Return the mime type of the generated content in this. parameter. NOTE: Can be null so check to avoid Exceptions
dir - Directory in which to create return file. Can be null
Returns:
A temporary file of the contents of the template output or null.

                                java.lang.StringBuffer mimeType)
Called by the StringTemplateHandler to populate a string based template.

Parameters:
template - The StringTemplate instance
request - The Request instance.
mimeType - Return the mime type of the generated content in this. parameter. NOTE: Can be null so check to avoid Exceptions
Returns:
A temporary file of the contents of the template output or null.

                                   java.lang.StringBuffer mimeType)

Parameters:
